content: Hi all, quick question. Is it possible to configure the HAPI FHIR JPA server to validate against StructureDefinitions that you create in a custom profile? Is this common practice? If not, are profile just ways on presenting how data is exchanged and not used at all on the server side?
Does anyone know? I can't find clear documentation on this.
sure, just upload your profiles ro a hapi server
if you use the hapsi jpa starter server you can also add the needed FHIR packeages in the config yml
